document.full_text: blockbuster inc's future was at stake on tuesday as billionaire investor carl icahn squared off against dish network corp and two other suitors at a bankruptcy auction to decide the movie rental chain's next owner.
document.title: icahn, dish, others vie for bankrupt blockbuster
lines_and_colors: blockbuster inc's future was at stake on tuesday as billionaire investor carl icahn squared off against dish network corp and two other suitors at a bankruptcy auction to decide the movie rental chain's next owner.
